sense.gloss: government and people, government and private sector, public and private sector

sdata.j: ↑東南↑↓とうなん↓アジアのインフラ↑整備↑↓せいび↓で↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓が↑中心↑↓ちゅうしん↓↑的↑↓てき↓↑役割↑↓やくわり↓を↑担↑↓にな↓うため、|↑官民|↑↓かんみん↓↑一体↑↓いったい↓となった↑努力↑↓どりょく↓が↑求↑↓もと↓められている。
sdata.e: In order for Japan to play a central role in the infrastructural improvement of Southeast Asia, tremendous effort between its government and people is required.
